WhyModding.title: Why Mod Your Phone?
WhyModding.philosophyDesc: Modding is the art of taking control. Your Android should work for you, not the manufacturer. With full access (Root/UBL), you define performance, privacy, and looks without limits.

OprekTypes.title: Choose Your Path
OprekTypes.subtitle: Every journey begins with a single step.
OprekTypes.ublDesc: The main gateway to modification. Mandatory step before touching system partitions.
OprekTypes.ublTechnical: Unlocks manufacturer-imposed bootloader security, allowing flashing of boot, recovery, and system partitions. Without this, signature verification rejects any modification.
OprekTypes.ublFeat3: Can be Relocked to return to factory state
OprekTypes.rootDesc: Be the admin of your own phone. Remove bloatware, tweak kernel, and modify without limits.
OprekTypes.rootTechnical: Gains 'Superuser' (su) access rights on the Android Linux system. Uses Magisk/KernelSU for systemless boot image patching.
OprekTypes.romDesc: Replace stock OS with a lighter community-built OS.
OprekTypes.romTechnical: Replaces the entire Android operating system (ROM) with a modified version (AOSP, Lineage, etc.) for performance or features not found in stock.
OprekTypes.romFeat1: Android version newer than official support
OprekTypes.romFeat3: Customize status bar, quick settings, etc.
OprekTypes.kernelDesc: Tune CPU/GPU for extreme gaming or 2-day battery life.
OprekTypes.kernelTechnical: Replaces the core Linux kernel to change CPU frequency management, governor, I/O scheduler, and low-level hardware drivers.
OprekTypes.modulesDesc: Install extra features without touching system partitions (systemless).
OprekTypes.modulesTechnical: Uses Magisk 'overlay' mechanism to inject files into the system at boot without modifying physical partitions (systemless interface).
